reviewText: I absolutely loved these book! The characters were so well-developed, and the plot kept me hooked from start to finish.
A captivating read with unexpected twists and turns. Highly recommended!
As a long-time fan of the author, I had high expectations for this book, and it did not disappoint! Brilliantly written.
While the premise was intriguing, I found the execution lacking. The pacing felt off, and some characters fell flat.
An enjoyable read with well-crafted prose. I couldn't put it down!Way too much addictive but I can't help but continuing
